text: José Antonio Sánchez (born August 2, 1970 in Madrid) is a track and field athlete from Spain. He is blind. He is a T12/B2 type athlete. He raced at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. He raced at the 2000 Summer Paralympics in Sydney, Australia. == References == Category:Spanish middle-distance runners Category:Living people Category:1970 births Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T12 Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2 Category:Sportspeople from Madrid
title: José Antonio Sánchez
